sections.heading: Short Title. This Act may be cited as the Supreme Court Historic Preservation Act.
sections.text: Short Title. This Act may be cited as the Supreme Court Historic Preservation Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. For the purpose of this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. For the purpose of this Act:

sections.heading: Supreme Court Historic Preservation Commission; creation; commissioners; appointments; terms; compensation.
sections.text: Supreme Court Historic Preservation Commission; creation; commissioners; appointments; terms; compensation.

sections.heading: Commission policy, powers, and duties
sections.text: The Commission shall assist and advise the Court in regard to the acquisition, collection, documentation, preservation, cataloging, and related matters with respect to historic aspects of buildings, objects, artifacts, documents, and information, regardless of

sections.heading: Annual report.  The Commission shall provide a report of its fiscal and programmatic activities to the Court, the Governor, and the General Assembly, on or before January 31, 2009, and annually thereafter
sections.text: Annual report. The Commission shall provide a report of its fiscal and programmatic activities to the Court, the Governor, and the General Assembly, on or before January 31, 2009, and annually thereafter.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
